title: Tom Phillips
creator_credit: Arbor Films, Arts Council of Great Britain, Margaret Williams and David Rowan
brief_description: Covers many aspects of Tom Phillips’ work which includes painting, drawing, graphics and music. Features commentary by Phillips about his two collage works “Humument” and “Benches” providing a fascinating insight into the mind of this original and creative artist.
